$:/poc2go/pocket-io/macros.text:
\define topButton() <$button class="poc2go-tiddler-top tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" to=<> >Top \end \define writeup() <
""" "open">> \end \define .codesample(n,lng,eg)
<$macrocall $name="copy-to-clipboard" style="" src="""$eg$"""/> <$codeblock language="$lng$" code="""$eg$"""/>
\end \define details(label:"", src:"source", status:"", labelClass:"", srcClass:"") <$vars source = {{{ [<__src__>get[text]else<__src__>] }}} >
<$let tv-wikilinks="no"> $label$
<$transclude tiddler=<> field=title mode=block/>
\end
$:/poc2go/pocket-io/macros.title: $:/poc2go/pocket-io/macros

$:/poc2go/pocket-io/macros/project.text:
\define closeTabsButton(project,tab) <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=""/> {{$:/core/images/fold-button}} {{$:/pocket-io/$project$/$tab$||$:/poc2go/pocket-io/ui/Tag$tab$}} <> \end \define projectSubmitTab() <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" actions="<>" > {{$:/core/images/new-button}} \end \define projectTabType() <$select field="ioPrjTabType" default="code"> <$edit-text field="ioPrjTabName" size=10 /> \end \define projectSubmitUpload() <> \end \define projectUploadButton() {{!!ioResultUpload}}
<$button actions="<>"> Upload    <$select field="ioPrjTabSelected" default="AALLLL"><$list filter="[tag{!!title}tag[code]]">   <$checkbox field="ioPrjMinify" checked="yes" unchecked="no" default="yes"> Minify code
\end
$:/poc2go/pocket-io/macros/project.title: $:/poc2go/pocket-io/macros/project

$:/poc2go/pocket-io/css/styles.title: $:/poc2go/pocket-io/css/styles

$:/poc2go/pocket-io/ui/Tagcode.text:
\whitespace trim >> <$set name="transclusion" value=<>> <$macrocall $name="tag-pill-body" tag="Server Code" icon={{{ [] :cascade[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TiddlerIconFilter]!is[draft]get[text]] }}} colour={{{ [] :cascade[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TiddlerColourFilter]!is[draft]get[text]] }}} palette={{$:/palette}} element-tag="$button" element-attributes="""popup=<> dragFilter="[subfilter{$:/core/config/TagPillDragFilter}]" tag='span'""" /> <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="below" animate="yes" class="tc-drop-down"> <$set name="tv-show-missing-links" value="yes"> <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/ListItemTemplate"/> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TagDropdown]!has[draft.of]]" variable="listItem"> <$transclude tiddler=<>/>
<$macrocall $name="list-tagged-draggable" tag=<>/>
$:/poc2go/pocket-io/ui/Tagcode.title: $:/poc2go/pocket-io/ui/Tagcode

<$macrocall $name="list-tagged-draggable" tag=<>/>
